entry.content:
A new play-to-earn game...

 

We have been planning this for a while here at Redeaux Games. A multiplayer, multi-platform battle arena game, with a play-to-earn model that earns ŁôŁž and MEOW NFTs! 

MEOW NFTs are warriors you can use in your battles! Most are common and some are rare! ŁôŁℂḁṭẕ 😻 is a token that has been minted on the Algorand blockchain, and it can be swapped to other cryptocurrencies like ALGO and MAGMA!
